author: D. Greig and Hava T. Siegelmann and Michael Zibulevsky
title: A New Class of Sigmoid Activation Functions That Don't Saturate
window: a sequence of 100 networks was trained using different values of ø for each hidden node. For the auto-mpg, servo and Tecator data sets (3 hidden nodes) the ø values (0:5; 1:5; 2:5) were used, for the glass data set (6 hidden nodes), the values (0:5; 1:0; 1:5; 2:0; 2:5; 3:0) were used, and for the bodyfat data set (7 hidden nodes)
